AI_QUICK_TEMPER.NAME: Quick Temper
AI_QUICK_TEMPER.DESC: Whenever [ENEMY] shuffles their deck, Deploy [D] Irked.

AI_RIFLED_POCKETS.NAME: Rifled Pockets
AI_RIFLED_POCKETS.DESC: Unplayable. When drawn, copy [D] card(s) from [ENEMY]'s hand and add them to your hand, then Scour this.

AI_RITES.NAME: Rites
AI_RITES.DESC: Deal [D]-[D] damage. Deals bonus damage equal to the number of your Talisman arguments (currently [N]).

ESPHER_JUXTAPOSITION.NAME: Juxtaposition
ESPHER_JUXTAPOSITION.DESC: Refresh the use of your partner ability this negotiation. Scour.
QUIPS: [PARTNER]! Take this over for a bit.
